title: Constantly disconnecting from PVP.net (tried the IGMP and IPHelper)
body:
As topic, i have tried em all, both didnt work. Now im being banned from playing for 30 mins everytime i failed to click accept for joining game and the button didnt even pop up for me to press accept as i was DCed.

Please help. I kept disconnecting n connect back in lobby, maybe abt 5-8 times in 1 min.
